00064 class DateTime {
00065  public:
00066     int year;
00067     int month;
00068     int day;
00069     int hour;
00070     int minute;
00071     int second;
00072     unsigned long fraction;
00073     int frac_precision;
00074     
00075     string ToString() const {
00076         stringstream str;
00077         str <<month<<"/"<<day<<"/"<<year<<" "<<hour<<":"<<minute<<":"<<second<<"."<<fraction;
00078         return str.str();
00079         
00080     }
00081 };
